sentences.en: A journey on the Loire is a meander in history, art and daily life.
sentences.cn: 畅游在卢瓦尔河,仿佛是行进在历史 、 艺术与现实的交错之中.

sentences.en: Cup foot line makes fine rule meander.
His talk appears to meander but by the end focuses attention on the true state of affairs.
sentences.cn: 他的谈话看似不着边际，最终却集中到了事态的真相上来。

sentences.en: I liked to meander through familiar streets.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢闲逛穿过熟悉的街道.

sentences.en: It's so restful to meander along Irish country roads.
sentences.cn: 沿着爱尔兰的乡间小路漫步是多么惬意。

sentences.en: Locals and visitors love to meander along the beautiful coastline.
sentences.cn: 当地的居民和观光客都喜欢沿着海岸线漫步.

sentences.en: Rather, we meander, mainly due to a slight structural or functional imbalance of our legs.
sentences.cn: 相反, 我们是曲折前行的, 这主要是因为我们的双腿在结构或功能上有点不平衡.

sentences.en: The river meandered gently along the valley floor.
sentences.cn: 那条河沿着谷底缓缓地蜿蜒而行。

sentences.en: They tumble down mountainsides; they meander through flat farmlands.
sentences.cn: 它们滚滚冲下山脊, 蜿蜒穿过平坦的农田.

sentences.en: They usually meander down to the pub after work.
sentences.cn: 他们通常下班后漫步到那家小酒店去.

sentences.en: Thoughts meander like a restless wind inside a letter box.
sentences.cn: 思绪象不平静的风在信箱里蜿蜒着.

sentences.en: Using the - coordinate POM model core position and flux on Kuroshio frontal meander are studied.
sentences.cn: 本文运用简化的坐标POM模式研究了东海黑潮锋面弯曲的产生与成长机制.

sentences.en: Visitors and locals alike meander along the sidewalks of the Seine River.
sentences.cn: 游客与当地人沿着塞纳河岸漫步聊天.

sentences.en: We took a gravel road that meandered through farmland.
sentences.cn: 我们走上了一条蜿蜒穿越农田的石子路。

trans.tran_cn: 漫步, 弯曲, 曲流
trans.tran_en: if a river, stream, road etc meanders, it has a lot of bends rather than going in a straight line
if a river, stream, road etc meanders, it has a lot of bends rather than going in a straight line

trans.tran_cn: （指溪流、河流等）蜿蜒而流，闲逛，无目的地走动，漫谈
